com.versant.var
Class VARCheckMeta

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.var.VARCheckMeta

public class VARCheckMeta
extends java.lang.Object

VARCheckMeta scans the replication request queue and replication message queue for consistency. The class also provides options to repair the inconsistency in the queue meta data.

Usage:

[{-repairMsgQ|-repairCircularQ|-repairReqQ}]

This utility should be run in passive mode. All other replication processes should be stopped before and not be running during this time.

Required parameters are:

  • -database <dbname> Database name.

    Optional parameters are:

    -repairCircularQ

    -repairMsgQ

    -repairReqQ
